s.eng: Murāri Gupta, the royal physician. [In Rāma-līlā he is Hanuman. The notes from his diary form the basis of the Ādi-līlā of Caitanya-caritāmṛta (CC Ādi 13.15)]
Mukunda Datta [He was a school friend of Mahāprabhu and one of the main singers in His pastimes. In Kṛṣṇa-līlā he is the singer Madhukaṇṭhā]

Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī [In Kṛṣṇa-līlā he is Lalitā-devī. The notes from his diary provide the details for the Madhya- and Antya-līlā of Caitanya-caritāmṛta. He is known to be one of the 3 ½ most intimate associates of Mahāprabhu]
Paramānanda Purī [In Kṛṣṇa-līlā he is Uddhava. He was the god brother of Mahāprabhu’s guru, Īśvara Purī, and a constant companion of Mahāprabhu in His pastimes in Jagannātha Purī]
Rāmānanda Rāya [In Kṛṣṇa-līlā he is Viśākhā-devī. He is also known to be one of the 3 ½ most intimate associates of Mahāprabhu]

translation.eng: [Chant the following names of Śrīman Mahāprabhu and His associates:] Śrī Kṛṣṇa Caitanya Mahāprabhu, Advaita Ācārya, Nityānanda Prabhu, Gadādhara Paṇḍita, Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura, Murāri Gupta, Mukunda Datta, Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī, Rūpa Gosvāmī, Sanātana Gosvāmī, Paramānanda Purī, Rāmānanda Rāya!
